column8: Scores go from -5 to +5, where -5 is very negative impact, 0 is a neutral effect, and +5 is a positive impact.

column1: Use re-usable water bottle and lunchbox
Lobby a business to change how it operates
Switch to a green energy supplier
Living wage for clothes factory workers; end fast-fashion
Living wage for UK; ensure people can afford more ethical clothes
Reduce Food waste and compost/ anaerobic digest food that can't be eaten.
4 day working week; buy less, make less, live more
Remove subsidies for fossil fuels, and bring in subsidies for renewables
Insulate all homes and buildings to a high standard
Ground Source Heat Pumps in all new buildings
Mattress recycling; turn into home insulation
MuSCOs/ washing machine, fridge, phone upgrades
Flawed/corrupt recycling system vs reducing waste
Plastic waste; micro-plastics, animals and humans consume them
Waste gets send to Indonesia, Malaysia, doesn’t actually get recycled
Fracking industry makes plastic; better to REDUCE rather than recycle
Average bottle only gets recycled once, however could downcycle; make clothes out of stuff
Ocean gyres; fishing nets, not straws
